page.title: 10The Effect of Milton Keynes
page.content: The building of the new city, Milton Keynes, within a few miles of Potterspury has effected the village in many ways. The price of houses has risen because many people who work in the City find it more agreeable to live outside its confines. On the other hand, the villagers can and do take advantage of the many facilities available in Milton Keynes. There are several Leisure Centres offering swimming, many indoor games and other pursuits. The large shopping centre at Central Milton Keynes is well patronised by the villagers, probably to the detriment of the village shop. There is much entertainment available and a fine Central Library. A certain amount of employment has been provided for the villagers and many now work in Milton Keynes.
